work.title: Training & Quality of Sales Coordinator
keyFigures: Developed eLearning training modules passed by 1500+ employees
Developed a dashboard used by Sales Department

responsibilities.title: Developed an internal Quality of Sales Dashboard
responsibilities.description: The dashboard is a smart and interactive platform for internal use that served as a: tracking tool, quality evaluator, knowledge monitor, market share analyzer and training planner.
responsibilities.achievements: The dashboard got adopted on the general management level and was used by the sales department employees and managers (over 300 people).
problemsAddressed: provided qualitative interpretation of quantitative data
optimized existing processes within the training team

responsibilities.title: Developed a desktop program that simplified search of the information created in over 5 years
responsibilities.description: The program consisted of a user interface where the user entered some keywords and the program was searching for these keywords in an excel document that was updated with new keywords for every new information document published. This decision of using an excel doc was dictated by the requirement of not having a database and because of the fact that all the docs were in pdf format and searching through several hundreds of pdf files would last longer than needed. The result was a list of documents with matched keywords that the user could open from within the program.
responsibilities.achievements: Initially the program was developed for the Training Team I was working in, but due to the fact that it was saving time when needed to search for some documents that were published more than 2 weeks ago and it was adopted by the whole sales network and used by over 300 employees.
problemsAddressed: considerably reduced search time for documents
optimized existing processes within the training team

responsibilities.title: Soft-skills training delivery
responsibilities.description: Developed and delivered soft-skills trainings for direct and indirect networks, for sales representatives and middle management of the company.

responsibilities.title: Mystery Shopping survey coordinator
responsibilities.description: Coordinated the survey organization details with the company that was providing Mystery Shopping services and responsible for the final presentation. The survey consisted in filling in questionnaires after visits in our shops and aggregating the obtained data. Then, based on the results, the company had an clearer understanding of the current reality of sales processes and took concrete action steps in order to improve the sales processes.
achievements: Significantly improved the presentation phase of the survey results by implementing visualization principles on data and by providing specific action steps based on the survey results. And as an emotional component, the general management liked the new format of presentation phase.
problemsAddressed: provided qualitative interpretation of quantitative data

responsibilities.title: Developed Member Educational Cycle for AIESEC in Ukraine members
responsibilities.description: The document consisted of eligible opportunities per general and per each functional area (HR, External Relations, Communication, etc.) for members at each level of their AIESEC experience.
responsibilities.achievements: An approved document that was put in use by the Member Committee of AIESEC in Ukraine.
problemsAddressed: ensuring consistency of education of organization members
standardizing core educational knowledge on the organization level

responsibilities.title: Agenda and Conference manager at the Train the Trainers conferences

problemsAddressed: ensuring consistency of education of organization members

responsibilities.title: Speakers Coach

achievements: organized the best event (as per that time)

responsibilities.title: Event host
responsibilities.description: Together with TEDxChisinau curator, we were the hosts of the big TEDxChisinau: Crossroads event on the 25th of May, 2015.

responsibilities.title: Teaching the "Ethics and Basics of Communication" course for the English speaking group.
responsibilities.description:
The course consists of 3 modules:
1. Brain (physiological and psychological aspects) - learning about 3 key aspects of brain functioning that help us live: attention, memory and senses;
2. Ethics - with a focus on teamwork ethics, how to work in a team, what are the pitfalls;
3. Presentation Skills - how to communicate your idea efficiently, how to use visual aids in your presentation, how to define a presentation goal and why it is important.
achievements: good evaluation score of the course given by students at the end of the year (evaluation made by the curator of the english speaking group)
